page.title: 20 An Overview.
page.content: More than one hundred children and staff contributed to the work contained on this disk.Children from Worlingham Middle School and North Cove Primary School worked on this project and derived much pleasure from this. The children were between the ages of nine and eleven and worked:out in thefield,with maps,on paper and on the computer. We hope that anyone who needs information from our D-Block enjoys reading our screen pages and viewing our slides. Mr.K Savage deserves a special mention for co-ordinating the computing.His local knowledge too was invaluable.
